窢字的基本解释

窢
huò
逆风声（一说迅速）：“其风窢然，恶可而言。”

窢字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xù］
［《集韻》忽域切，入職，曉。］
［《集韻》忽麥切，入麥，曉。］
逆风声。《庄子·天下》：“其風窢然，惡可而言。”郭象注：“逆風所動之聲。”一说，迅速貌。

窢字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【穴字部】　窢； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页866第40
【集韻】忽麥切，音劃。窢然，逆風聲。　又忽域切，音洫。【莊子·天下篇】其風窢然，惡可而言。【郭註】逆風聲，音同洫。

窢字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
窢字的起名意思

暂无。

窢
Basic explanation of words
窢
huò
Headwind (swiftly speaking): "The wind is lonely, but the evil can be said."
窢
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xù］
["Ji Yun" suddenly cut, enter the post, Xiao. ]
["Ji Yun" Suddenly Maiqie, Enter Mai, Xiao. ]
Headwind. "Zhuangzi·Tianxia": "The wind is rusty, but the evil can be said." Guo Xiang's note: "The sound moved by the wind." Once he said, he looked quickly.
窢
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Collection] [Acupoint Word Department] 　窢; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 866 No. 40
[Jiyun] Suddenly Maiqie, phonogram. Sui Ran, against the wind.　Suddenly cut again, Yinxiu. [Zhuangzi·Tianxia Chapter] The wind is rusty, and evil can be said. [Guo's Note] The sound against the wind is the same as the sound.
窢
